bug.author: rainfalj
bug.summary: make error with can't find core hpp file
bug.description: When I make after cmake, meet the error: [ 0%] Generate opencv.pc Scanning dependencies of target libprotobuf [ 0%] Building CXX object modules/cudev/CMakeFiles/opencv_cudev.dir/src/stub.cpp.o [ 0%] Building C object 3rdparty/ittnotify/CMakeFiles/ittnotify.dir/src/ittnotify/ittnotify_static.c.o opencv/modules/cudev/src/stub.cpp:1:32: fatal error: opencv2/core/cvdef.h: No such file or directoryã€‚How can I solve it ?
